text: Martinus "Tinus" Bosselaar (January 16, 1936 â€“ June 6, 2018) was a Dutch footballer. He was active as a left winger. Bosselaar was born in Rotterdam. He played for the Netherlands national football team from 1955 to 1962. He also played for Sparta and Feyenoord. Bosselaar died on June 6, 2018 in Rotterdam of heart failure at the age of 82.Oud-international Tinus Bosselaar (82) overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile * Biography * Profile Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Footballers from Rotterdam
